name: Fresh Flowers
description:
Down-on-their-luck Harry and Gerry decide to try and make some quick money selling flowers in Fantastico Park one pleasant day.  Unfortunately, a bee may have other plans for them.

This story is presented as a kinetic visual novel (meaning no interactive choices made by the reader).  It takes approximately 10-15 minutes to read, has approximately 390 renders, and contains 13 songs.

This is our first attempt at a visual story using Ren'Py and Daz 3D.  It isn't perfect but has given us something to build upon as we start on future projects.

Please visit our companion site heavenshire.com for more information about the world of Heavenshire and our current projects.

If you enjoyed what you read, please consider supporting us on our Patreon.
